misconceptions.inferred_category_name: No conceptual error detected (correct right-rotation logic)
misconceptions.student_thought_process: The student believes they must save the last element, shift the rest of the array one index to the right by copying from left neighbors, then restore the saved last element into index 0.
misconceptions.conceptual_gap: No gap: this matches Java’s execution model and array assignment semantics. The temporary variable preserves the value that would otherwise be overwritten during the in-place shift.
misconceptions.error_manifestation: No error; produces correct output for all n >= 0 (including n=0 and n=1).
